# Deadly Maw
## Overview
Your bite is truly vicious, able to eviscerate creatures with one deadly snap.

## Requirements and Restrictions
**Prerequisite**: *[[Kraidyl]], Strength 17 or higher*

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- Increase the base damage die size of your bite attack by one step. (1d6 g 1d8 g 2d6 g 3d6)
- Once per turn when you roll damage for a melee weapon attack with your bite, you can reroll the bite's damage dice and use either total.
